content.text:

Eugene Levy is a Canadian actor, writer and comedian.
He received thirteen Primetime Emmy Award nominations winning four times, two for SCTV Network 90 and two for Schitt's Creek. He also received a Grammy Award, two Screen Actors Guild Awards, and 11 Canadian Comedy Awards.
